definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
men and women should not touch hands when they give or receive things (citation, from Mencius)
pinyin: nan2 nu:3 shou4 shou4 bu4 qin1

definition: lit. Lord Ye's passion for dragons (idiom)/fig. to pretend to be fond of sth while actually fearing it/ostensible fondness of sth one really fears
(coll.) lowest-ranking (student, participant etc)/to rank at the bottom of the list/to finish last
unity is strength (revolutionary slogan and popular song of 1943)
pinyin: tuan2 jie2 jiu4 shi4 li4 liang5

definition: lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/nitpicking/overcritical
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1
